name: Phantas-matcha
description:
Step into the whimsical world of Phantas-matcha, a mysterious tea shop specialising in a very peculiar kind of tea, run by two even more peculiar ladies!

This game was made by Dream Tea(m) for Ludum Dare 48, based on the theme "Deeper and Deeper".

DEV LOG 27/04: Fixed a display issue where the "Quit" button would overlap with the arrow moving the story forward, causing players to quit the game if they clicked on the  arrow.

Made on Unity and Fungus. 

Story, writing, music & art assets by Dream Tea(m), with the exception of the following:

3rd party assets credits:

Speech Bubbles

Dialog Box Vectors by Vecteezy

Ink bottle (intro)

Ink Bottle Vectors by Vecteezy

pen (intro)

Ink Bottle Vectors by Vecteezy

Paperbag (mini-game)

Paper Bag Vectors by Vecteezy

Chopping board (mini-game)

Chopping Board Vectors by Vecteezy

Tea leaves (mini-game)

Food vector created by macrovector - [www.freepik.com](http://www.freepik.com/)

Powder (mini-game)

Food vector created by macrovector - [www.freepik.com](http://www.freepik.com/)
